title: Pelosi hammer attacker shouted 'where is Nancy?'
description: The leading US Democrat's husband was attacked by an intruder in their Californian home. Also: Elon Musk clears out Twitter bosses in $44bn deal; the Rock and Roll legend Jerry Lee Lewis dies aged 87.
itunes:subtitle: The suspect is facing charges including attempted murder
itunes:summary: The leading US Democrat's husband was attacked by an intruder in their Californian home. Also: Elon Musk clears out Twitter bosses in $44bn deal; the Rock and Roll legend Jerry Lee Lewis dies aged 87.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
